long_description: The Luminox Navy SEAL Colormark watch puts masculine style, extremely durable performance and dependable nighttime visibility on your wrist for all your outdoor adventures. Precise Swiss quartz movement powers the analog display and date window. Tritium gas tubes on hands and markers glow steadily for up to 25 yrs. Counter-clockwise rotating bezel with timer markings allows you to use the minute hand as a 60-min. countdown timer. Carbon-reinforced polycarbonate case and a hardened mineral crystal stand up to years of rigorous outdoor use. The Luminox Navy SEAL Colormark watch resists water to 200m (650 ft.).
short_description: The Luminox Navy SEAL Colormark watch puts masculine style, extremely durable performance and dependable nighttime visibility on your wrist for all your outdoor adventures.
